Title: Profile - Modal Open
Description: Verify Profile Modal opens from Account Menu

Title: Profile - Modal Open
Expected Result: Profile Modal opens showing avatar, name, username, and credits.

Title: Profile - Avatar Upload
Description: Verify user can upload a new avatar

Title: Profile - Avatar Upload
Expected Result: File selector or crop modal appears.

Title: Profile - Avatar Upload
Expected Result: 1. Avatar updates in Modal.\n2. Avatar updates in Account Menu button.

Title: Profile - Credit Display
Expected Result: Credit card shows correct balance (e.g. 5 credits).

Title: Profile - Close Modal
Steps: Click 'X' button or click outside modal.
Expected Result: Modal closes, Account Menu button remains visible.

Title: Profile - Menu Access
Description: Verify Profile Trigger in Account Menu
Expected Result: Top section displays Avatar, Name, Username and Credits pill. Highlighting on hover.

Title: Profile Modal - Fields Check
Description: Verify all profile fields are present

Title: Profile Modal - Fields Check
Expected Result: Modal opens showing: Full Name, Email, Username, Remaining credits, LinkedIn Profile, About.

Title: Profile Modal - Read Only Credits
Preconditions: User Logged In on Profile Modal

Title: Profile Modal - Read Only Credits
Expected Result: Field is disabled or read-only, value cannot be changed manually.

Title: Profile Modal - Edit Info
Description: Verify user can update profile info
Preconditions: User Logged In on Profile Modal
